name: Revenue Department
description: Manages land records, revenue collection, and general district administration.

name: Panchayat and Rural Development
description: Oversees rural governance, gram panchayats, and rural development schemes.

name: Health Department
description: Administers public health services, hospitals, and disease control programs.

name: Agriculture Department
description: Promotes crop development, farmer welfare, and agricultural infrastructure.

name: Food Department
description: Manages public distribution system and food security programs.

name: Education Department
description: Administers primary and secondary schooling across government and aided schools.

name: Commerce and Industry
description: Facilitates industrial investment, trade licenses, and economic development.

name: Mining Department
description: Regulates mineral extraction, leases, and environmental compliance.

name: Home Department
description: Coordinates law and order, police, and internal security matters.

name: Transport Department
description: Handles vehicle registration, driving licenses, and road transport regulation.

name: Labour Department
description: Enforces labour laws, industrial relations, and worker welfare schemes.

name: Public Works Department
description: Constructs and maintains roads, bridges, and government buildings.

name: Social Welfare Department
description: Implements welfare programs for women, children, disabled, and senior citizens.

name: Higher Education Department
description: Regulates colleges, universities, and professional education institutions.

name: Finance Department
description: Manages state budget, treasury operations, and financial planning.
